forecast.day_comments: Snow.  High near 17. South wind around 6 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A 40 percent chance of snow before 1am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 15. South wind around 5 mph becoming calm  after midnight.  Total nighttime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
